meanings.definition: Covered in or resembling a net
meanings.sent1: The fisherman caught the nettiest fish in the lake.
meanings.sent2: The spider spun its nettiest web in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent3: The basketball net looked nettiest when tangled with leaves from the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was a nettiest mess after playing in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The nettiest fabric was perfect for catching butterflies.

meanings.sent1: The nettiest material for the hammock was soft and strong.
meanings.sent2: The nettiest rope was used to secure the boat to the dock.
meanings.sent3: The nettiest pattern on the curtains reminded her of a cozy cabin.
meanings.sent4: His words formed a nettiest barrier, protecting her from harm.
meanings.sent5: The nettiest texture of the carpet felt comforting underfoot.

meanings.definition: Most intricate or complex in design, structure, or appearance
meanings.sent1: The nettiest puzzle took hours to solve.
meanings.sent2: The nettiest painting in the gallery was a masterpiece of detail.
meanings.sent3: The nettiest maze in the garden confused even the cleverest mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her nettiest dress was adorned with delicate lace and embroidery.
meanings.sent5: The nettiest architecture in the city was a marvel of modern design.
